name: SAN ANTONIO RIVER AUTHORITY
description: Protection of creeks and rivers and other bodies of water in the San Antonio area.
sampleDescriptions: Ecosystem restoration project approvals, reimbursement and development of Corps of Engineers' projects (generally, no specific legislation); and implementation of the Water Infrastructure Improvements

Provisions regarding funding for reimbursement and development of ecosystem restoration projects for Corps of Engineers program in House Energy and Water Development 2018 Appropriations bill, H.R.3266
